articles.title_eng: From the life of a rich dad.
articles.summary_uz: Qiyin bo‘lsa ham, bir nechta odam non topyapdi. Yana bir yil guv etib o‘tib ketdi.
articles.summary_eng: Although it is difficult, several people are earning bread. Another year has passed.
